verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* Elijah \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Tishbite|strong="H8664"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w among|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w settlers|strong="H8453"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*,\f + \fr 17:1 \ft Or who was from Tishbe in Gilead\f* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Ahab, “\w As|strong="H1697"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*—\w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*—\w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* neither \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* \w nor|strong="H2919"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w these|strong="H6440"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w except|strong="H3588"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*!”
\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* revelation \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Elijah:

“Leave \w here|strong="H2088"\w*, \w turn|strong="H6437"\w* \w eastward|strong="H6924"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5921"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Cherith|strong="H3747"\w*, \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.\f + \fr 17:3 \ft Or the Cherith Ravine, near the Jordan; also in verse 5\f*

\w And|strong="H8033"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6680"\w* \w brook|strong="H5158"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w I|strong="H6680"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H6680"\w* \w ravens|strong="H6158"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w feed|strong="H3557"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* Elijah \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w told|strong="H1697"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Cherith|strong="H3747"\w*, \w east|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.

\w The|strong="H4480"\w* \w ravens|strong="H6158"\w* \w would|strong="H1320"\w* bring \w him|strong="H4480"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w meat|strong="H1320"\w* \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w would|strong="H1320"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w brook|strong="H5158"\w*.

\w Some|strong="H7093"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w later|strong="H7093"\w*, \w however|strong="H3588"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w dried|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w rain|strong="H1653"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land. The Widow of Zarephath

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Elijah:

“\w Get|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Zarephath|strong="H6886"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Sidon|strong="H6721"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w stay|strong="H3427"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*. \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H2009"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* widow \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w provide|strong="H3557"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* Elijah \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Zarephath|strong="H6886"\w*. \w When|strong="H2009"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* arrived \w at|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w gate|strong="H6607"\w*, \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w was|strong="H5892"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* widow \w gathering|strong="H7197"\w* \w sticks|strong="H6086"\w*. Elijah \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cup, \w so|strong="H3947"\w* \w that|strong="H5892"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w as|strong="H3947"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w going|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w get|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w*, \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w*, “\w Please|strong="H4994"\w* \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w piece|strong="H6595"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* replied, “\w As|strong="H6213"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w no|strong="H6213"\w* \w bread|strong="H4580"\w*—\w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w handful|strong="H4393"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w flour|strong="H7058"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w jar|strong="H3537"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w jug|strong="H6835"\w*. \w Look|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w gathering|strong="H7197"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w couple|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w sticks|strong="H6086"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w take|strong="H6213"\w* \w home|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w meal|strong="H7058"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* myself \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* eat \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.”

“\w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*,” Elijah \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w her|strong="H3318"\w*. “\w Go|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*. \w But|strong="H7223"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w small|strong="H6996"\w* \w cake|strong="H5692"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w bread|strong="H5692"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w*. Afterward, \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w some|strong="H8033"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w yourself|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,

\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w jar|strong="H3537"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w flour|strong="H7058"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w exhausted|strong="H3615"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w jug|strong="H6835"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w run|strong="H2637"\w* dry \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w sends|strong="H5414"\w* \w rain|strong="H1653"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth.’”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Elijah, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w there|strong="H3117"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w food|strong="H1004"\w* \w every|strong="H3212"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* Elijah \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w woman|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H1931"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w jar|strong="H3537"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w flour|strong="H7058"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w exhausted|strong="H3615"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w jug|strong="H6835"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* run dry, \w according|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H1696"\w*. Elijah Raises the Widow’s Son

\w Later|strong="H1961"\w*, \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w woman|strong="H1004"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* owned \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w ill|strong="H2470"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w sickness|strong="H2483"\w* \w grew|strong="H1121"\w* worse \w and|strong="H1121"\w* worse, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w breath|strong="H5397"\w* \w remained|strong="H3498"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w him|strong="H5704"\w*.

“\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God,” said \w the|strong="H2142"\w* woman \w to|strong="H4191"\w* Elijah, “\w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* done \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w me|strong="H4191"\w*? \w Have|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w come|strong="H2142"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w remind|strong="H2142"\w* \w me|strong="H4191"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H2142"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* cause \w the|strong="H2142"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H2142"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*?”

\w But|strong="H3947"\w* Elijah said \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.” \w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w arms|strong="H2436"\w*, \w carried|strong="H5927"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w upper|strong="H5944"\w* \w room|strong="H5944"\w* \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w staying|strong="H3427"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w laid|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* own \w bed|strong="H4296"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1571"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w brought|strong="H7489"\w* tragedy \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H7121"\w* widow \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* opened \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w home|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w by|strong="H5921"\w* causing \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*?”

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w stretched|strong="H4058"\w* \w himself|strong="H5315"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w boy|strong="H3206"\w*’s \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w*!”

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w listened|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Elijah, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w*’s \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w lived|strong="H2421"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* Elijah \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w child|strong="H3206"\w*, \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w upper|strong="H5944"\w* \w room|strong="H1004"\w* \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* mother. “\w Look|strong="H7200"\w*, \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*,” Elijah declared.

\w Then|strong="H6258"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w woman|strong="H2088"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Elijah, “\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* truth.”
